presentationColumns.name: Expansion Active MRR
presentationColumns.description: The total Expansion MRR for Active Subscriptions (The difference in MRR between a target and source of an amendment relationship where the target MRR is greater than Source MRR and the target start date falls within this period and not in Draft/Cancelled)

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.Expansion Active MRR in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Contraction Active MRR
presentationColumns.description: The total Contraction MRR for Active Subscription(The difference in MRR between a target and source of an amendment relationship where the target MRR is less than Source MRR and the target start date falls within this period and not in Draft/Cancelled)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.Contraction Active MRR in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Average Revenue per Customer (ARPU)
